titleStmt.title: The answer of Ferdinando Lord Fairfax to a declaration of William Earle of Newcastle, touching a late vvarrant issued by the Lo: Fairfax, dated 2. February. 1642. As also, the Lord Fairfax's willingnesse to decide the controversie with the said Earle of New-castle in a fayre field.
titleStmt.author: Fairfax, Ferdinando Fairfax, Baron, 1584-1648.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the appointment of Fernando Lord Fairfax: at London for Iohn Franke, and are to be sold at his shop next door to the Kings-head Taverne in Fleetstreet,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
